alert.note: Alert for Casper Mountain; East Sweetwater County; Flaming Gorge; Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Jackson Hole; Lander Foothills; Natrona County Lower Elevations; Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains; Rock Springs and Green River; Salt River and Wyoming Ranges; South Lincoln County; Southeast Big Horn Basin; Southwest Big Horn Basin; Star Valley; Upper Green River Basin; Upper Green River Basin Foothills; Upper Wind River Basin; Wind River Basin; Wind River Mountains East; Wind River Mountains West (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 4:20PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Strong Outflow Wind Gusts this Evening... This is a special weather statement from the National Weather Service Office in Riverton. * WHAT...Isolated showers and thunderstorms could produce localized wind gusts between 35 and 50 mph. * WHERE...Most of Western and Central Wyoming. * WHEN...Through 8 PM this evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong wind gusts can occur well ahead of a storm. Due to warm temperatures and dry air at the surface, very little precipitation is expected to fall from these storms. Be aware of rapidly changing wind direction. Strong winds can blow over unsecured objects.
